subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: One day after bashing three home runs, all Carlos Beltran could muster was a double. But on a night of breakouts and comebacks, the Mets still got their three home runs.
snippet: One day after bashing three home runs, all Carlos Beltran could muster was a double. But on a night of breakouts and comebacks, the Mets still got their three home runs.
